parameters: Come on, we needa figure out
Dad! I wrote down what needs to be done in
each room. If everyone follows these
solutions exactly, we’ll be able to get the
Kraken off the sub and escape safely.
Whaddya mean ya wrote it down?
How’d ya even figure it out so fast?
I don’t have time to explain.
Okay, I trust you, but you gotta explain
later. I’ll let the crew know, you go deal
I will, I promise. And don’t worry,
I’ll see you once this is over.
Samuel Anderson  Lead Designer, Audio and Visual Artist
Akumu Games      Character Noisy Steps Plugin
